蕄蕄蕄

蕄字的基本解释

蕄
méng
〔蕄蕄〕存在；自在。亦作“萌萌”。

蕄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［méng］
［《廣韻》莫耕切，平耕，明。］
亦作“萠1”。亦作“蕄1”。
(1)植物的芽。
(2)草木发芽。
(3)比喻事情刚刚显露的发展趋势或情况；开端。
(4)开始；产生。
(5)锄去。
(6)通“氓”、“甿”。百姓；黎民。

蕄字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蕄； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1056第43
【唐韻】莫耕切，音氓。【爾雅·釋訓】存存、萌萌，在也。【疏】萌萌，《說文》作蕄蕄。　又武登切，音瞢。義同。　本亦作萌。見萌字註。

蕄字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蕄字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Stubble
méng
〔蕄蕄〕exist; at ease. Also known as "Meng Meng".
Stubble
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［méng］
["Guangyun" Mo Gengqie, Flat Plowing, Ming. ]
Also known as "萠1". Also known as "蕄1".
(1) The buds of plants.
(2) Germination of vegetation.
(3) It is a metaphor for the development trend or situation that has just been revealed; the beginning.
(4) Start; produce.
(5) Hoe away.
(6) Through "rogue" and "rogue". People; Li Min.
Stubble
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Zi] 　蕄; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 1056 to 43
[Tang Yun] Mo Gengqie, sound gangster. [Erya·Shixun] Cun Cun, cute and cute. [Sparse] Mengmeng, "Suo Wen" is made of water.　Take Wu Dengqi again, sound 瞢. The same meaning.　This is also cute. See note on cute characters.
